00020 #include <stddef.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <limits.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <ccn/schedule.h>
00025 
00026 /**
00027  * Use this unsigned type to keep track of time in the heap.
00028  *
00029  * 32 bits can work, but 64 bits are preferable.
00030  */
00031 typedef uintptr_t heapmicros;
00032 static const heapmicros epochmax = ((heapmicros)(~0))/2;
00033 
00034 /**
00035  * We use a heap structure (as in heapsort) to
00036  * keep track of the scheduled events to get O(log n)
00037  * behavior.
00038  */
00039 struct ccn_schedule_heap_item {
00040     heapmicros event_time;
00041     struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev;
00042 };
00043 
00044 struct ccn_schedule {
00045     void *clienth;
00046     const struct ccn_gettime *clock;
00047     struct ccn_schedule_heap_item *heap;
00048     int heap_n;
00049     int heap_limit;
00050     int heap_height;    /* this is validated just before use */
00051     heapmicros now;     /* internal micros corresponding to lasttime  */
00052     struct ccn_timeval lasttime; /* actual time when we last checked  */
00053     int time_leap;      /* number of times clock took a large jump */
00054     int time_ran_backward; /* number of times clock ran backwards */
00055 };
00056 
00057 /*
00058  * update_epoch: reset sched->now to avoid wrapping
00059  */
00060 static void
00061 update_epoch(struct ccn_schedule *sched)
00062 {
00063     struct ccn_schedule_heap_item *heap;
00064     int n;
00065     int i;
00066     heapmicros t = sched->now;
00067     heap = sched->heap;
00068     n = sched->heap_n;
00069     for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00070         heap[i].event_time -= t;
00071     sched->now = 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 static void
00075 update_time(struct ccn_schedule *sched)
00076 {
00077     struct ccn_timeval now = { 0 };
00078     int elapsed;
00079     if (sched->clock->gettime == 0)
00080         return; /* For testing with clock stopped */
00081     sched->clock->gettime(sched->clock, &now);
00082     if ((unsigned)now.s - (unsigned)sched->lasttime.s >= INT_MAX/4000000) {
00083         /* We have taken a backward or large step - do a repair */
00084         sched->time_leap++;
00085         sched->lasttime = now;
00086     }
00087     elapsed = now.micros - sched->lasttime.micros +
00088         sched->clock->micros_per_base * (now.s - sched->lasttime.s);
00089     if (elapsed < 0) {
00090         elapsed = 0;
00091         sched->time_ran_backward++;
00092     }
00093     else if (elapsed >= epochmax - sched->now)
00094         update_epoch(sched);
00095     sched->now += elapsed;
00096     sched->lasttime = now;
00097 }
00098 
00099 struct ccn_schedule *
00100 ccn_schedule_create(void *clienth, const struct ccn_gettime *ccnclock)
00101 {
00102     struct ccn_schedule *sched;
00103     if (ccnclock == NULL)
00104         return(NULL);
00105     sched = calloc(1, sizeof(*sched));
00106     if (sched != NULL) {
00107         sched->clienth = clienth;
00108         sched->clock = ccnclock;
00109         update_time(sched);
00110         sched->time_leap = 0;
00111     }
00112     return(sched);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void
00116 ccn_schedule_destroy(struct ccn_schedule **schedp)
00117 {
00118     struct ccn_schedule *sched;
00119     struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev;
00120     struct ccn_schedule_heap_item *heap;
00121     int n;
00122     int i;
00123     sched = *schedp;
00124     if (sched == NULL)
00125         return;
00126     *schedp = NULL;
00127     heap = sched->heap;
00128     if (heap != NULL) {
00129         n = sched->heap_n;
00130         sched->heap = NULL;
00131         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00132             ev = heap[i].ev;
00133             (ev->action)(sched, sched->clienth, ev, CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL);
00134             free(ev);
00135         }
00136         free(heap);
00137     }
00138     free(sched);
00139 }
00140 
00141 const struct ccn_gettime *
00142 ccn_schedule_get_gettime(struct ccn_schedule *schedp) {
00143     return(schedp->clock);
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*
00147  * heap_insert: insert a new item
00148  * n is the total heap size, counting the new item
00149  * h must satisfy (n >> h) == 1
00150  */
00151 static void
00152 heap_insert(struct ccn_schedule_heap_item *heap, heapmicros micros,
00153             struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev, int h, int n)
00154 {
00155     int i;
00156     for (i = (n >> h); i < n; i = (n >> --h)) {
00157         if (micros <= heap[i-1].event_time) {
00158             heapmicros d = heap[i-1].event_time;
00159             struct ccn_scheduled_event *e = heap[i-1].ev;
00160             heap[i-1].ev = ev;
00161             heap[i-1].event_time = micros;
00162             micros = d;
00163             ev = e;
00164         }
00165     }
00166     heap[n-1].event_time = micros;
00167     heap[n-1].ev = ev;
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*
00171  * heap_sift: remove topmost element
00172  * n is the total heap size, before removal
00173  */
00174 static void
00175 heap_sift(struct ccn_schedule_heap_item *heap, int n)
00176 {
00177     int i, j;
00178     heapmicros micros;
00179     if (n < 1)
00180         return;
00181     micros = heap[n-1].event_time;
00182     for (i = 1, j = 2; j < n; i = j, j = 2 * j) {
00183         if (j + 1 < n && heap[j-1].event_time > heap[j].event_time)
00184             j += 1;
00185         if (micros < heap[j-1].event_time)
00186             break;
00187         heap[i-1] = heap[j-1];
00188     }
00189     heap[i-1] = heap[n-1];
00190     heap[n-1].ev = NULL;
00191     heap[n-1].event_time = 0;
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*
00195  * reschedule_event: schedule an event
00196  * ev is already set up and initialized
00197  */
00198 static struct ccn_scheduled_event *
00199 reschedule_event(
00200     struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00201     int micros,
00202     struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev)
00203 {
00204     int lim;
00205     int n;
00206     int h;
00207     struct ccn_schedule_heap_item *heap;
00208     if (micros >= epochmax - sched->now)
00209         update_epoch(sched);
00210     heap = sched->heap;
00211     n = sched->heap_n + 1;
00212     if (n > sched->heap_limit) {
00213         lim = sched->heap_limit + n;
00214         heap = realloc(sched->heap, lim * sizeof(heap[0]));
00215         if (heap == NULL) return(NULL);
00216         memset(&(heap[sched->heap_limit]), 0, (lim - n) * sizeof(heap[0]));
00217         sched->heap_limit = lim;
00218         sched->heap = heap;
00219     }
00220     sched->heap_n = n;
00221     h = sched->heap_height;
00222     while ((n >> h) > 1)
00223         sched->heap_height = ++h;
00224     while ((n >> h) < 1)
00225         sched->heap_height = --h;
00226     heap_insert(heap, sched->now + micros, ev, h, n);
00227     return(ev);
00228 }
00229 
00230 /*
00231  * ccn_schedule_event: schedule a new event
00232  */
00233 struct ccn_scheduled_event *
00234 ccn_schedule_event(
00235     struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00236     int micros,
00237     ccn_scheduled_action action,
00238     void *evdata,
00239     intptr_t evint)
00240 {
00241     struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev;
00242     if (micros < 0)
00243         return(NULL);
00244     ev = calloc(1, sizeof(*ev));
00245     if (ev == NULL) return(NULL);
00246     ev->action = action;
00247     ev->evdata = evdata;
00248     ev->evint = evint;
00249     update_time(sched);
00250     return(reschedule_event(sched, micros, ev));
00251 }
00252 
00253 /* Use a dummy action in cancelled events */ 
00254 static int
00255 ccn_schedule_cancelled_event(struct ccn_schedule *sched, void *clienth,
00256                              struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev, int flags)
00257 {
00258     return(0);
00259 }
00260 
00261 /**
00262  * Cancel a scheduled event.
00263  *
00264  * Cancels the event (calling action with CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL set)
00265  * @returns 0 if OK, or -1 if this is not possible.
00266  */
00267 int
00268 ccn_schedule_cancel(struct ccn_schedule *sched, struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev)
00269 {
00270     int res;
00271     if (ev == NULL)
00272         return(-1);
00273     res = (ev->action)(sched, sched->clienth, ev, CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL);
00274     if (res > 0)
00275         abort(); /* Bug in ev->action - bad return value */
00276     ev->action = &ccn_schedule_cancelled_event;
00277     ev->evdata = NULL;
00278     ev->evint = 0;
00279     return(0);
00280 }
00281 
00282 static void
00283 ccn_schedule_run_next(struct ccn_schedule *sched)
00284 {
00285     struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev;
00286     heapmicros late;
00287     int res;
00288     if (sched->heap_n == 0) return;
00289     ev = sched->heap[0].ev;
00290     sched->heap[0].ev = NULL;
00291     late = sched->now - sched->heap[0].event_time;
00292     heap_sift(sched->heap, sched->heap_n--);
00293     res = (ev->action)(sched, sched->clienth, ev, 0);
00294     if (res <= 0) {
00295         free(ev);
00296         return;
00297     }
00298     /*
00299      * Try to reschedule based on the time the
00300      * event was originally scheduled, but if we have gotten
00301      * way behind, just use the current time.
00302      */
00303     if (late > res)
00304         res = 1;
00305     else if (late <= sched->clock->micros_per_base)
00306         res -= late;
00307     reschedule_event(sched, res, ev);
00308 }
00309 
00310 /*
00311  * ccn_schedule_run: do any scheduled events
00312  * This executes any scheduled actions whose time has come.
00313  * The return value is the number of micros until the next
00314  * scheduled event, or -1 if there are none.
00315  */
00316 int
00317 ccn_schedule_run(struct ccn_schedule *sched)
00318 {
00319     heapmicros ans;
00320     do {
00321         while (sched->heap_n > 0 && sched->heap[0].event_time <= sched->now)
00322             ccn_schedule_run_next(sched);
00323         update_time(sched);
00324     } while (sched->heap_n > 0 && sched->heap[0].event_time <= sched->now);
00325     if (sched->heap_n == 0)
00326         return(-1);
00327     ans = sched->heap[0].event_time - sched->now;
00328     if (ans < INT_MAX)
00329         return(ans);
00330     return(INT_MAX);
00331 }

00333 #ifdef TESTSCHEDULE
00334 // cc -g -o testschedule -DTESTSCHEDULE=main -I../include ccn_schedule.c
00335 #include <stdio.h>
00336 #include <unistd.h>
00337 #include <sys/time.h>
00338 
00339 static void
00340 my_gettime(const struct ccn_gettime *self, struct ccn_timeval *result)
00341 {
00342     struct timeval now = {0};
00343     gettimeofday(&now, 0);
00344     result->s = now.tv_sec;
00345     result->micros = now.tv_usec;
00346 }
00347 
00348 static struct ccn_gettime gt = {"getTOD", &my_gettime, 1000000, NULL};
00349 
00350 static void
00351 testtick(struct ccn_schedule *sched)
00352 {
00353     sched->now = sched->heap[0].event_time + 1;
00354     printf("%ld: ", (long)sched->heap[0].event_time);
00355     ccn_schedule_run_next(sched);
00356     printf("\n");
00357 }
00358 static char dd[] = "ABDEFGHI";
00359 #define SARGS struct ccn_schedule *sched, void *clienth, struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev, int flags
00360 static int A(SARGS) { if (flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) return(0);
00361                       printf("A"); return 70000000; }
00362 static int B(SARGS) { printf("B"); return 0; }
00363 static int C(SARGS) { printf("C"); return 0; }
00364 static int D(SARGS) { if (flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) return(0);
00365                       printf("D");  return 30000000; }
00366 int TESTSCHEDULE(int argc, char **argv)
00367 {
00368     struct ccn_schedule *s = ccn_schedule_create(dd+5, &gt);
00369     int i;
00370     struct ccn_scheduled_event *victim = NULL;
00371     int realtime = 0;
00372     if (argv[0] != NULL)
00373         realtime = 1;
00374     if (!realtime)
00375         gt.gettime = 0;
00376     ccn_schedule_event(s, 11111, A, dd+4, 11111);
00377     ccn_schedule_event(s, 1, A, dd, 1);
00378     ccn_schedule_event(s, 111, C, dd+2, 111);
00379     victim = ccn_schedule_event(s, 1111111, A, dd+6, 1111111);
00380     ccn_schedule_event(s, 11, B, dd+1, 11);
00381     testtick(s);
00382     ccn_schedule_event(s, 1111, D, dd+3, 1111);
00383     ccn_schedule_event(s, 111111, B, dd+5, 111111);
00384     if (realtime) {
00385         for (;;) {
00386             i = ccn_schedule_run(s);
00387             if (i < 0)
00388                 break;
00389             printf("    %d usec until %ld\n", i, (long)s->heap[0].event_time);
00390             usleep(i); /* not posix, but this is not compiled by default */
00391         }
00392     }
00393     else {
00394         for (i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
00395             if (i == 50) { ccn_schedule_cancel(s, victim); victim = NULL; }
00396             testtick(s);
00397         }
00398     }
00399     printf("\n");
00400     ccn_schedule_destroy(&s);
00401     return(0);
00402 }
00403 #endif
